text:
Created attachment 22368
Contains JUnit test class and documents used for testing.

The text contained in the comments of an excel 2007 document is not extracted.
Find in attachments the JUnit test class and the documents used for testing.
We expected to extract the words "testdoc" and "test phrase".

Notes on the attached documents:

- the documents "classic_TextInComment.xlsx" and "form_TextInComment.xlsx" contain the words "testdoc" and "test phrase" as comments.


"TestUnitPoi35Filter.java" is the JUnit class.
creator: grizolle_benedicte@emc.com

text:
As with hssf, you need to call
   setIncludeCellComments(true)
to request that comments are included in the extraction (by default they're not)
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
batrakov@gmail.com
text: Is there any chance that these issues aren't generated by robots and comments are ever being read? :)
No idea on the robot/person thing, but bugzilla entries do tend to come up high in google, so hopefully someone else will benefit from the report answer no matter what!
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
